content: * final dimensions ~7 25in x 5 25in * this project is written in us terminology * you will be using the alpine stitch this stitch is made by alternating double_crochet and fpdc * you will be joining at the end of each round *chain 2 at the beginning of each round does not count as a double_crochet * this sleeve will fit a kindle paperwhite the one pictured is a 11th gen skills required basic knowledge of crochet basic sewing skills project materials yarn worsted weight 55g i used red heart super saver 5 00 mm hook stitch markers 20mm button tapestry needle scissors stitch abbreviations chain- chain slip_stitch- slip_stitch single_crochet- single_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet fpdc- front post double_crochet st- stitch fo- finish off
